data.description: A spacious penthouse in a new building in the center of Mitzpe Ramon. 2 bedrooms. 2 large balconies. Parking is available (not shaded). Fully equipped kitchen (without Tami4). Double bed in bedroom and double sofa bed in the protected space. There's an air conditioner in the living room and bedroom. In the protected space there is a fan/radiator. About 15 minutes' walk from the HaBasmam Square and the commercial center.
